content.question: A student wants to create an algorithm to calculate the average (mean) of two quiz scores. Which of the following algorithms can be used to determine the correct average?

choices.label: Step one:Add the two quiz scores.Step two:Multiply the result of step one by 2 to determine the average.
Step one:Add the two quiz scores.Step two:Divide the result of step one by 2 to determine the average.
Step one:Subtract the lower quiz score from the higher quiz score.Step two:Multiply the result of step one by 2 to determine the average.
Step one:Subtract the lower quiz score from the higher quiz score.Step two:Divide the result of step one by 2 to determine the average.

content.answer: Step one:Add the two quiz scores.Step two:Divide the result of step one by 2 to determine the average.
